title: Project-Based WordPress Front-End Developer
job_overview:
Position: Project-Based WordPress Front-End Developer
Compensation: $5.00 per hour
Payment Schedule: Based on project timelines (open for discussion)

We are looking for an experienced WordPress Front-End Developer! This is project-based work, and we currently have 2-3 projects to work on.

The ideal candidate MUST HAVE experience in the following:
- Converting web designs from Figma/PSD to WordPress/websites
- Proficiency in HTML, CSS and JavaScript
- WordPress development, including API functionality/integrations
- PHP and SQL knowledge is a plus

We use Slack, Google Meet, and ClickUp for team collaboration. 

Your responsibilities will be:
- Developing interactive UI animations (e.g. image flipping, custom transitions)
- Front-end development for WordPress sites designed in Figma
- Performing quality control for website responsiveness and functionality
- Integrating 3rd-party applications (both native and API)
- Ensuring the site is stable and secure via WAF

To apply, please reply to this job post and answer the following questions:
1) How long have you been a web developer?
2) Do you have experience converting Figma designs into WordPress websites?
3) Please share links to your CV and portfolio of WordPress/web projects.
(Note: Kindly include contact info for references on your portfolio, if available)

Kindly include the word "tangerine" in the subject line of your response to indicate you've read the job description fully. Apply now to join our creative team, we would love to hear from you!
